data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Mayagüez, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mayagüez, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Mayagüez.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Mayagüez, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Mayagüez to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mayagüez
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mayagüez, Mayagüez, Puerto Rico.
Spirit, of the 44,417 people in the state of Mayagüez who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Mayagüez.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 23,279 believers in Mayagüez to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
